title: [ER] Cargo features fix suggestions

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: C-feature-request
labels.description: Category: A feature request, i.e: not implemented / a PR.

body:
Please tell me if I have to move this diagnostic Enhancement Request elsewhere (into the the Cargo stuff).

In a new Cargo project I create in vec_test\src\main.rs:
```rust
use tinyvec::*;

fn main() {
    let mut v = TinyVec::<[u8; 15]>::new();
}
```

It doesn't compile and it doesn't explain how to fix the problem:

```rust
...\vec_test>cargo run
    Updating crates.io index
   Compiling tinyvec v1.0.0
   Compiling vec_test v0.1.0 (...\vec_test)
error[E0433]: failed to resolve: use of undeclared type or module `TinyVec`
 --> src\main.rs:4:17
  |
4 |     let mut v = TinyVec::<[u8; 15]>::new();
  |                 ^^^^^^^ use of undeclared type or module `TinyVec`

warning: unused import: `tinyvec::*`
 --> src\main.rs:1:5
  |
1 | use tinyvec::*;
  |     ^^^^^^^^^^
  |
  = note: `#[warn(unused_imports)]` on by default

error: aborting due to previous error; 1 warning emitted

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0433`.
error: could not compile `vec_test`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
```

What I'd like: it to explain that this error is caused by Cargo features and I'd also like it to suggest how to fix it, replacing this line of Cargo.toml:

```
tinyvec = "1.0.0"
```
With:
```
tinyvec = { version = "1.0.0", features=["alloc"] }
```
Good error messages with good fixing suggestions could save lot of time to lot of people.
